passive_1: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. If the target is a champion, inflict them with Expose Weakness for 4 seconds, causing them to take [8%|6%] increased damage from all sources (1.5 second cooldown).

After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. If the target is a champion, inflict them with Expose Weakness for 6 seconds, causing them to take [10%|6%] increased damage from all sources (1.5 second cooldown).

After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 150% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. If the target is a champion, inflict them with Expose Weakness for 6 seconds, causing them to take [10%|5%] increased damage from all sources (1.5 second cooldown).

After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 150% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. If the target is a champion, inflict them with Expose Weakness for 6 seconds, causing them to take [10%|6%] increased damage from all sources (1.5 second cooldown).

After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 150% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. If the target is a champion, inflict them with Expose Weakness for 6 seconds, causing them to take ( 12% /  8%) increased damage from all sources (1.5 second cooldown).
passive_2: Consumes a charge to place a  Stealth Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop (4 charges; 600 range).
passive_3: Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
